branchCategory.name: AMP
branchCategory.description: <p>Exhaust cleaner, series 90-AMP, can be used inside a clean room.&nbsp;90-AMP is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. Depending on operating conditions, exhaust air cleanliness may be equivalent to Class 100.&nbsp; Since exhaust air from pneumatic equipment can be released directly into a clean room, piping to ducts is unnecessary thereby reducing piping labor costs and increasing space savings.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: 90-AMP, Exhaust Cleaner, Clean Exhaust Type
branchItem.description: <p>Exhaust cleaner, series 90-AMP, can be used inside a clean room.&nbsp;90-AMP is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. Depending on operating conditions, exhaust air cleanliness may be equivalent to Class 100.&nbsp; Since exhaust air from pneumatic equipment can be released directly into a clean room, piping to ducts is unnecessary thereby reducing piping labor costs and increasing space savings.&nbsp;</p>
